name: Beautiful Yahoo BabelFish (babelfish.yahoo.com)
description:
A Beautiful Yahoo BabelFish ,no ads
-------------------------------------
Yahoo BabelFish can help you to translate something as you konw,it's powerful but has a lot of rubish.
I just killed them and made it looks comfortable
-------------------------------------
I have a small site in dhost,http://dhost.info/tumuyan

=====================================
babelfish.yahoo.com这玩意是个翻译的好工具；可惜太丑了；于是我干掉了广告和垃圾信息，重新调配了显示效果，好了，你可以随意用了。
我在dhost有个小站，额，就是上边那个链接啦☆~~
